languages.text: "Мои собратья могли столкнуться с новой угрозой — стервятниками вроде пиратов или чем хуже. Если их взяли в плен..." {n}Обычно спокойный голос эльдарки дрожит то ли от страха, то ли от гнева.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Моим собратья могли столкнуться с новой угрозой — стервятниками вроде пиратов или чем хуже. Если их взяли в плен..." {n}Обычно спокойный голос эльдарки дрожит то ли от страха, то ли от гнева.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "My kin could have been faced with a new threat, scavengers like pirates or something worse. If they were taken prisoner..." {n}Yrliet's voice is trembling with something that could be either anger or fear.{/n}

traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Mes semblables ont peut-être fait face à une menace inconnue, des pirates, des pillards, ou pire encore. Si j'apprends qu'ils ont été faits prisonniers... » {n}La voix d'Yrliet se fait tremblante, mais il est impossible de dire si c'est dû à la peur ou à la colère.{/n}
languages.original_text: "My kin could have been faced with a new threat, scavengers like pirates or something worse. If they were taken prisoner..." {n}Yrliet's voice is trembling with something that could be either anger or fear.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Mes semblables ont peut-être fait face à une menace inconnue, des pirates, des pillards, ou pire encore. Si j'apprends qu'ils ont été faits prisonniers... » {n}La voix d'Yrliet se fait tremblante, mais il est impossible de dire si c'est dû à la peur ou à la colère.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “我的族人很可能面临着新的威胁，比如海盗之类的漂流者，或是更可怕的敌人。如果他们遭到了俘虏……”{n}伊莉耶特的声音颤抖着，或许是出于愤怒，也或许是由于恐惧。{/n}
languages.original_text: "My kin could have been faced with a new threat, scavengers like pirates or something worse. If they were taken prisoner..." {n}Yrliet's voice is trembling with something that could be either anger or fear.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我的族人很可能面临着新的威胁，比如海盗之类的漂流者，或是更可怕的敌人。如果他们遭到了俘虏……”{n}伊莉耶特的声音颤抖着，或许是出于愤怒，也或许是由于恐惧。{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Meine Verwandten hätten vor einer neuen Bedrohung stehen können, Plünderer, Piraten oder Schlimmeres. Wären sie gefangen genommen worden ..." {n}Yrliets Stimme zittert, ob nun vor Wut oder vor Angst.{/n}
languages.original_text: "My kin could have been faced with a new threat, scavengers like pirates or something worse. If they were taken prisoner..." {n}Yrliet's voice is trembling with something that could be either anger or fear.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Meine Verwandten hätten vor einer neuen Bedrohung stehen können, Plünderer, Piraten oder Schlimmeres. Wären sie gefangen genommen worden ..." {n}Yrliets Stimme zittert, ob nun vor Wut oder vor Angst.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «Mi gente podría estar enfrentándose a una nueva amenaza, como piratas o algo peor. Y si los han hecho prisioneros...». {n}Ya sea de odio o de miedo, la voz de Yrliet tiembla.{/n}
languages.original_text: "My kin could have been faced with a new threat, scavengers like pirates or something worse. If they were taken prisoner..." {n}Yrliet's voice is trembling with something that could be either anger or fear.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Mi gente podría estar enfrentándose a una nueva amenaza, como piratas o algo peor. Y si los han hecho prisioneros...». {n}Ya sea de odio o de miedo, la voz de Yrliet tiembla.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「我が同族は、海賊に近いスカベンジャーか、それよりもっと恐ろしい敵に出会っていた可能性がある。彼らが捕虜になっていたとしたら…」{n}ユリエットの声は、怒りなのか恐怖なのか、どちらかが理由で震えている。{/n}
languages.original_text: "My kin could have been faced with a new threat, scavengers like pirates or something worse. If they were taken prisoner..." {n}Yrliet's voice is trembling with something that could be either anger or fear.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「我が同族は、海賊に近いスカベンジャーか、それよりもっと恐ろしい敵に出会っていた可能性がある。彼らが捕虜になっていたとしたら…」{n}ユリエットの声は、怒りなのか恐怖なのか、どちらかが理由で震えている。{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Soydaşlarım korsanlarla ya da daha kötü bir tehditle karşılaşmış olabilir. Esir düştülerse..." {n}Yrliet'in sesi titriyor ama öfkeden mi yoksa korkudan mı anlaşılmıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "My kin could have been faced with a new threat, scavengers like pirates or something worse. If they were taken prisoner..." {n}Yrliet's voice is trembling with something that could be either anger or fear.{/n}
